meanings.sent1: The seemings of the forest at night can be quite eerie.
meanings.sent2: Her seemings of happiness masked her true feelings of sadness.
meanings.sent3: The seemings of the clown's smile hid his true emotions.
meanings.sent4: The seemings of the calm sea belied the storm brewing beneath the surface.
meanings.sent5: The seemings of the old house made it look haunted.

meanings.definition: Things that appear to be true or real
meanings.sent1: The seemings of success can sometimes be deceiving.
meanings.sent2: His seemings of honesty were just a facade to cover up his lies.
meanings.sent3: The seemings of the magic trick left the audience in awe.
meanings.sent4: The seemings of a perfect life on social media are often misleading.
meanings.sent5: The seemings of a peaceful town were shattered by the sudden crime wave.
